title: 107_s2198
content: Civil War Sesquicentennial Commission Act of 2002 - Establishes a Civil War Sesquicentennial Commission to plan, develop, and carry out programs and activities appropriate to commemorate the sesquicentennial of the Civil War. Requires the Commission to award a grant in each of FY 2003 through 2015 to: (1) the US Civil War Center at Louisiana State University, Louisiana, and (2) the Civil War Institute at Gettysburg College, Pennsylvania.
